sentences.en: A customer reluctantly listens as awaitress and her inexplicable chorus of Vikings extol the virtues of the processed meat.
sentences.cn: 一位顾客非常不情愿地听着服务生和她那只莫名其妙的维京人合唱队赞颂这些肉食品。

sentences.en: Doctors often extol the virtues of eating less fat.
sentences.cn: 医生常常宣扬少吃脂肪的好处。

sentences.en: For instance, is one to extol or to expose?
sentences.cn: 比如说, 歌颂呢,还是暴露 呢 ?

sentences.en: I will extol the Lord at all times; his praise will always be on my lips.
sentences.cn: 我要时时称颂耶和华; 赞美他的话必常在我口中.

sentences.en: I will extol you, my God and King.
sentences.cn: 我的神, 我的王啊,我要尊从你.

sentences.en: If you extol dawn, then ask you to embrace night too?
sentences.cn: 如果你曾歌颂黎明, 那么也请你拥抱黑夜?

sentences.en: It is the humour of many heads to extol the days of their forefathers.
sentences.cn: 许多人天生喜欢吹捧祖先的时代.

sentences.en: Lord, we extol You as the speaking God.
sentences.cn: 哦,主耶稣, 我们颂扬你是说话的神.

sentences.en: Now experts are extolling the virtues of the humble potato.
sentences.cn: 现在专家们在颂扬粗陋的马铃薯的种种好处。

sentences.en: Remember to extol his work, which men have praised in song.
sentences.cn: 24你不可忘记称赞他所行的为大, 就是人所歌颂的.

sentences.en: Remember, you should extol his work, which men have praised in song.
sentences.cn: 你应记住要赞颂他的工程, 这是人们应歌咏的.

sentences.en: The man extol his girlfriend to the skies.
sentences.cn: 那人将他的女友捧上了天.

sentences.en: They extol the virtues of the peaceful life.
sentences.cn: 对于农村宁静生活的美处,他们称赞不已.

sentences.en: Those who have ulterior motives extol the film star to the skies.
sentences.cn: 那些别有用心的人把这个电影明星捧得上了天.

sentences.en: Though they extol the virtues of the peaceful life.
sentences.cn: 尽管他们都交口称赞宁静的乡村生活的种种优点.

sentences.en: We extol your love more than wine.
sentences.cn: 我们要称赞你的爱情,胜似称赞美酒.

sentences.en: Why does the church now extol the witnesses when Joseph Smith condemned them?
sentences.cn: 为什麽现在教会尊崇这些证人当斯密约瑟诅咒他们?

trans.tran_cn: 高度赞扬，赞美，颂扬，赞颂，吹捧
